ticket.title: fields_for does not accept an array as first argument
ticket.original-body:
According to documentation I found (http://railsapi.com/doc/rails-v3.0.0RC/classes/ActionView/Helpers/FormHelper.html#M002491) fields_for's first argument should accept an array. However I get an error pointing at line 1 in my HAML partial (fields_for is on line 1). I verified that @node is a valid model and not an array.
@@@ = fields_for [:admin, @node] do |form| ... @@@
Gives me the following error:
@@@ undefined method `model_name' for Array:Class @@@
Replacing fields_for with form_for works:
@@@ = form_for [:admin, @node] do |form| ... @@@
